title: Bobby’s No Good, Very Bad Day + Why Lunchbox’s Wife Is Mad At Him + Raymundo Gives Update On His President Trump Bet From 4 Years Ago
itunes:title: Bobby’s No Good, Very Bad Day + Why Lunchbox’s Wife Is Mad At Him + Raymundo Gives Update On His President Trump Bet From 4 Years Ago
description:
Bobby talks about how he took hit after hit in bad news yesterday. Lunchbox reveals why his wife is upset with him for something he’s been withholding from her. Raymundo gives an update on his $50k winning bet. Plus, the Sheriff on Caitlin's grandpa's house case calls into the show.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
